title: Ticket #6196: Add (MayUseAWS == TRUE) to default START expression.
description: Frank W (OSG) says this would be very important to him; some jobs don't run well on AWS but are still high-priority, plus it makes the user give explicit permission to send their jobs off the cloud.
remarks:
2017-Mar-16 15:10:35 by tlmiller:
Certainly need to mention this in the "how-to-use" instructions, along with the corresponding condor_qedit command.
check_ins: 2017-Mar-16 15:06   Check-in [50330]: (#6196) Alter the default START expression for annex instances to check for the MayUseAWS attribute. (By Todd L Miller )
creator: tlmiller
